A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Absolute total sh*t. Where do I start? Disney has taken a giant crap on Star Wars. 
Cons:
They killed off Luke Skywalker in the worst\, unemotional manner. Luke Skywalker was a prominent figure throughout the originals\, in this\, he's treated as if he's nothing. Leia\, flying through space? WTF? Barely any recognition for Carrie Fisher\, a short "in memory of" in the end credits? What about a send off like Fast and the Furious did for Paul Walker? Disneys inclusion of Porgs? Lame...CGI was over the top. Too many loop holes\, waste of time side story. 
Felt as if there was some Feminist/Cultural diversity movement. Almost borderline stealthy political ideology behind the movie. Just a big cash grab for Disney. You have ruined Star Wars completely. 
Pros: Hmm...
